title: A romantic tour de force with Demi Moore in her prime...
review: A couple of years ago I bought Ghost on vhs when I was on vacation in New York. Not knowing that that there are two (at least?) vhs standards I ended up with a movie I could not watch. Well, tonight I saw it for the first times in years and it was just as good as I remembered it. Demi Moore i simply put touching and Patrick Swayze is not bad either. These two certainly were in their primes at the time. If you can stand the slightly annoying Whoopi Goldberg then this is a really good and romantic movie. Just think of that clay scene...
